item.title: What happens when there are competing smartphone app stores
item.description:
Many Android app stores in China

  • Consolidation is happening:

    • ~7500 in 2012
    • ~400 in 2015
    • ~200 in 2017

  • There are ~100 that matter… and ~20 that really matter.
